price: Ni ho rero Twebwe Allah, Twafuririra Qaaruuni n’inyubakwa yiwe mu kuzimu maze amirwa n’isi, ntiyanaronse n’umwe mu ngabo, yomukingira ibihano vy’Imana Allah, eka ntiyari no mu barokoka muri nya bihano;
arabic: فَخَسَفۡنَا بِهِۦ وَبِدَارِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَمَا كَانَ لَهُۥ مِن فِئَةٖ يَنصُرُونَهُۥ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُنتَصِرِينَ

meta.transliteration: fakhasafnā bihi wabidārihi al-arḍa famā kāna lahu min fi-atin yanṣurūnahu min dūni al-lahi wamā kāna mina al-muntaṣirīna
translations: Then We caused to swallow up
